mapper.select: select membership_no as no, membership_name as name, membership_description as description, Membership_delete as state, category_no as "category.no", membership_price as price from helf_membership order by membership_no desc

select A.membership_no as no, A.membership_name as name, A.membership_price as price, A.category_no as catNo, B.category_name as catName, B.category_property as catProperty, B.category_use_option as useOption from helf_membership A, helf_membership_category B where A.category_no = B.category_no and A.membership_no = #{value}

select period_no as no, period_type as type, period_property as property, period_duration as duration, period_addprice as addPrice from helf_membership_period where period_type = #{value}
and period_property > 1

select period_no as no, period_type as type, period_property as property, period_duration as duration, period_addprice as addPrice from helf_membership_period where period_type = #{value} and period_property = 1
select period_no as no, period_type as type, period_property as property, period_duration as duration, period_addprice as addPrice from helf_membership_period where period_no = #{value}
select category_no as no, category_name as name, category_property as property, category_use_option as useOption from helf_membership_category where category_no = #{value}

select B.detaile_no as no, A.option_name as name, B.detaile_period as period, B.Detaile_price as price, A.option_no as "option.no" from helf_membership_option A, helf_membership_option_detaile B where A.option_no = B.option_no order by B.detaile_price

select B.detaile_no as no, A.option_name as name, B.detaile_period as period, B.Detaile_price as price, A.option_no as "option.no" from helf_membership_option A, helf_membership_option_detaile B where A.option_no = B.option_no and detaile_no = #{value}
select option_no as no, option_name as name from helf_membership_option
